name: Speedy Wagoner
description:
Speedy Wagoner is an arcade one-button game.

Drive your passengers to their respective stations safely to earn as much money as possible ! Controls :

Hold any key to move forward. Release to stop.
When their is a direction sign, pressing any key will launch the boomerang.
Protect your passengers by stopping the wagons.

Disclaimer :

This game is an early prototype made in a short amount of time. Their is no plan for further development.
